entry.title: My Name is Derek Hale [comic]
entry.summary:
Author: Melioristicbeast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 0Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 797

Summary: From the original fic this comic is an adaptation of:‚ÄúWhat day is it?‚Äù Derek demanded. ‚ÄúWhat?‚Äù ‚ÄúThe day! What day is today?!‚Äù Derek let Stiles go, but only so he could reach into his pocket and pull out his phone. He tapped at the home screen, and then went so perfectly still that Stiles was pretty sure this guy wasn‚Äôt human. No human could stand that still. When it was clear Derek wasn‚Äôt going to move again without some prompting, Stiles said, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs Wednesday.‚Äù ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs impossible,‚Äù Derek whispered. ‚ÄúNot really, it comes around every seven days.‚Äù ‚ÄúThis is impossible,‚Äù Derek said again, looking around himself, as if he was searching for something.

entry.title: Echoes of a Shattered Winter
entry.summary:
Author: am0rawr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,890Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 59

Summary: Ice keeps no memories. But Stiles carries them all.The falls on the cold, unforgiving rink.The voices that whisper even in empty halls.The marks on his body and soul that refuse to fade. He learned early that perfection comes at a price.That silence can be crueler than screams.That every practiced move, every forced smile, is a shield against a world that never stopped judging. Derek Hale is everything he should avoid.Captain of the football team.Popular. Untouchable.A face that sparks rage, defiance, and, against his own will, a strange pull he cannot explain. In Beacon Hills, every glance weighs heavy.Every whisper lingers.And sometimes, it‚Äôs impossible to escape.From the past.From desire.From the shadows that live in your own skin.

entry.title: Where Ashes Lie
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,103Chapters: 7/40Kudos: 33

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. After months of captivity behind concrete walls, Stiles manages to escape and disappears into the woods, where he finds a rebel group willing to take him in. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... They wouldn‚Äôt hate the cage that once held him.They‚Äôd build a stronger one.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 95,206Chapters: 35/?Kudos: 180

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren‚Äôt the only danger, here‚Äôs hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: A Tether in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: ReadNowSleepLater

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,764Chapters: 34/34Kudos: 204

Summary: Stiles Stilinski never meant to become a myth.After the fall of his pack and the fading of Beacon Hills‚Äô magic, he runs ‚Äì straight into a world older, darker, and far more complicated than he ever imagined. Mystic Falls is supposed to be a quiet place to start over, to ground himself again. Instead, it becomes the center of a storm he didn‚Äôt know was waiting for him.Drawn into the tangled lives of the Mikaelsons, Stiles finds unexpected warmth among immortals who should‚Äôve terrified him ‚Äì and something dangerously close to belonging. Between Elijah‚Äôs steady grace, Kol‚Äôs mischief, Klaus‚Äô possessive charm, and Peter‚Äôs return from the shadows, he starts to build something new: a family stitched together by chaos, magic, and a kind of love that defies logic.But magic never lets go without a fight, and neither do old bonds. When ghosts from his past and creatures from the dark rise to claim him, Stiles has to face what it truly means to be an anchor ‚Äì and what, and who, he‚Äôs willing to tether himself to.Because in the end, even in the dark, someone always reaches back.
